metadata.title: CVE-2016-7445 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - low
metadata.description:
convert.c in OpenJPEG before 2.1.2 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (NULL pointer dereference and application crash) viavectors involving the variable s.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7445` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenjp2-7 - 2.1.2-1
libopenjp2-tools - 2.1.2-1
libopenjpip-dec-server - 2.1.2-1
libopenjpip-server - 2.1.2-1
libopenjpip-viewer - 2.1.2-1
libopenjpip7 - 2.1.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openjpeg2 package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.2-1').
